components.description:
A red paper lantern, as hangs outside an izakaya, a Japanese bar that serves drinks and casual food. Generally depicted as cylindrical with a black top and base and soft, orange glow.

May be used to represent various lights and lanterns as well as for its red color.
components.title: Izakaya Lantern

description:

title: Izakaya Lantern

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Building and map symbols

emoji_net_data.name: red paper lantern

bn:00049944n: Case of transparent material made to protect a flame, or light.
Light in a transparent protective case
A case of translucent or transparent material made to protect a flame, or light, used to illuminate its surroundings.
A lantern is a portable lighting device or mounted light fixture used to illuminate broad areas.
